text: Hello! I am the PBR VITS Institutional Assistant. I can provide detailed academic, departmental, admission, placement, infrastructure, and policy information about PBR Visvodaya Institute of Technology and Science.

PBR Visvodaya Institute of Technology and Science (PBR VITS) is a private engineering institution established in 1998 in Kavali, Andhra Pradesh. It operates under Visvodaya Educational Society and offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs.
PBR VITS is affiliated with JNTUA and approved by AICTE. NAAC accreditation grade and approval details should be verified from the official website.
The campus is part of the Visvodaya campus in Kavali. Exact land area in acres should be verified from official institutional records.
B.Tech programs are 4 years (8 semesters). M.Tech, MBA, and MCA programs are generally 2 years.
The institution follows JNTUA regulations under a semester-based system, generally aligned with CBCS (Choice Based Credit System) structure.
Branch-wise intake capacity varies each academic year. Exact seat distribution for CSE, ECE, EEE, Mechanical, Civil, AI & ML, and IoT should be verified from official admission notifications.
CSE focuses on programming, AI, ML, data science, cybersecurity, cloud computing, and full stack development with modern computer labs.
ECE focuses on communication systems, VLSI, embedded systems, digital electronics, signal processing, and hardware labs.
EEE focuses on power systems, electrical machines, renewable energy systems, and control engineering.
Mechanical Engineering includes thermodynamics, manufacturing, CAD/CAM, robotics fundamentals, and workshop practice.
Civil Engineering includes structural engineering, geotechnical engineering, environmental engineering, and construction management.
AI & ML specialization focuses on deep learning, neural networks, computer vision, and intelligent systems.
IoT specialization focuses on embedded systems, smart devices, sensor networks, and automation.
Each department is headed by a Head of Department (HOD) and supported by qualified faculty members including Professors, Associate Professors, and Assistant Professors.
Departments have dedicated laboratories such as Programming Labs, Digital Electronics Labs, Communication Labs, Electrical Machines Labs, CAD Labs, Workshop Labs, and Project Labs.
The central library contains textbooks, reference books, journals, and digital learning resources. Exact book count should be verified from official records.

The Placement Cell conducts campus recruitment training and placement drives. Recruiters include TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, and others. Annual placement percentage and package statistics vary each year and are published officially.
Students are encouraged to undertake internships, industrial visits, and project-based industry interaction.

The institution has statutory bodies including Anti-Ragging Committee, Internal Complaints Committee (ICC), Grievance Redressal Cell, SC/ST Cell, Women Protection Cell, and Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC).
The examination system includes internal assessments and external semester-end exams under JNTUA regulations. Supplementary exams are conducted for backlog students.
Separate hostels for boys and girls are available with mess facilities and essential amenities. Hostel capacity details should be verified from official sources.
Transport services are provided for students from nearby towns and villages.
Campus facilities may include sports grounds, seminar halls, cafeteria, and basic amenities. Specific facility details should be verified from the official website.
Alumni of PBR VITS are working in engineering, IT, and various professional sectors across India and abroad.
Students can access academic information, results, and notifications through official institutional or university portals.
For official contact information including phone numbers and email addresses, please refer to the official website https://pbrvits.ac.in/.
Official social media links can be found on the footer section of the official website https://pbrvits.ac.in/.
The official website of PBR VITS is https://pbrvits.ac.in/ where admissions, placements, academic calendar, and notifications are published.
The Placement Cell conducts campus recruitment training, aptitude sessions, mock interviews, and placement drives. Recruiters include TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, and other IT companies.
